Text:
Though Xyanide plays similarly to various classic arcade shoot-'em-ups, it's got its own strange twists and style that are worth experiencing by fans of similar games.

By: Playlogic 
Genre: Shoot-'Em-Up 
Release Date: Aug 15, 2006 
Players: 1-2
